= Components =
(generated)


*Component items*:
  * *Cutaneous receptors of low neck (neck-low-cutaneous-receptors)*: skin of medial infraclavicular region
  * *Obliquus capitis inferior muscle (obliquus-capitis-inferior-muscle)*: rotation of head and neck
  * *Obliquus capitis superior muscle (obliquus-capitis-superior-muscle)*: extends head and flex head to the ipsilateral side
  * *Rectus capitis posterior major muscle (rectus-capitis-posterior-major-muscle)*: ipsilateral rotation of head and extension
  * *Rectus capitis posterior minor muscle (rectus-capitis-posterior-minor-muscle)*: extends the head at the neck, but is considered to be more of a sensory organ than a muscle
